response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we understand its true worth lies in the hands of someone who appreciates it fully. We are offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, a significant discount reflecting our confidence in your discerning taste and ability to appreciate its true worth. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that could potentially increase in value over time and serve as a testament to your excellent taste. We look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 950000}
